casebody.data:
James and Lara BARNHILL
v.
Richard W. FARRELL and The Farrell Law Group, PC No. 379P12-2 Supreme Court of North Carolina. September 20, 2018 John Walter Bryant, Amber Jean Ivie, Attorneys at Law, Raleigh, for Barnhill, James, et al. Richard W. Farrell, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, for Farrell, Richard W., et al.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 9th of April 2018 by Defendants in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 20th of September 2018."
